Package parkeersimulator.view.carpark

Class CarParkFloor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • parkeersimulator.view.carpark.CarParkFloor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    class CarParkFloor
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This class represents one of the floors containing the parking, It has the ability to draw parking spots and cars accordingly.
    Version:
    28.01.2019.
